name: Shooting Zombie Battle
description:
The war against the dead has begun. Shooting Zombie Battle is a pivotal military operation to secure a zombie-infested city. You are a member of an elite military team that will blast through the dead until the zombies are annihilated, and the city is secure. You will carry out missions to defend assets, protect the injured, gather supplies, provide sniper support and above all, hunt and kill the zombies.

Features:
- Amazing deadly zombie shootout.
- Realistic sounds and zombies attack animations.
- Stunning 3D graphics with detailed textures.
